paragraph: Schedule a free consultation with a San Diego business attorney for matters involving entity formation, contract drafting, corporate counsel, trademark protection, business acquisitions, and resolving business disputes.

detailsData.title: Personalized Legal Services
detailsData.content: Tailored and affordable legal services for businesses throughout San Diego.

detailsData.title: Innovative Retainer Package
detailsData.content: Reduced legal fees, free correspondence, project priority, quarterly consultations, and unlimited referrals.

detailsData.title: Fractional Corporate Counsel
detailsData.content: Outsourced corporate counsel services on a fractional basis for ongoing legal support.

address: 11622 El Camino Real, Suite 100, San Diego, CA 92130
valueProp: Kohler Legal is a San Diego based law practice that provides legal services and representation for early-stage companies, entrepreneurs, and small businesses.

testimonalData.text: Kohler Legal was nothing short of amazing. They helped me set up my LLC for my new consulting business, Dylan Caden Group, and I was impressed with their attention to detail and in-depth level of knowledge.
testimonalData.author: Andy B

testimonalData.text: We have to say choosing Kohler Legal to help with the legal practice of our company is the best decision we ever made. Words cannot describe how incredibly satisfied we are with their work.
testimonalData.author: Michael B

testimonalData.text: Jordan simply does great work! He makes the whole process easy, transparent, and educational. 100% recommended.
testimonalData.author: Steven M
